// import { Switch } from '@mui/material' import React, { useState } from 'react' // import { validate1 } from './Validate1' import "../form/Insert.css" import axios from 'axios' const Login = () => { const [togglee,settoggle] = useState(false); const toggle =()=>{ togglee ? settoggle(false):settoggle(true) } const url="http://192.168.1.40:8070/stud/view" const [data,setdata] = useState({ FullName: "", fatherName: "", motherName: "", F_occupation: "", M_occupation: "", email: "", phone: "", address: "", city: "", gender: "", }) console.log(data) function insert(e){ e.preventDefault(); axios.post(url,) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } function handle(e){ const newdata={...data} newdata[e.target.name] = e.target.value setdata(newdata) console.log(newdata) } return ( <>
insert(e)}> handle(e)} value={data.FullName} > handle(e)} value={data.fatherName}> handle(e)} value={data.motherName}> handle(e)} value={data.F_occupation}> handle(e)} value={data.M_occupation}> handle(e)} value={data.email}> handle(e)} value={data.phone} > {/*
*/} handle(e)} value={data.city } >
) } export default Login
